PERSONA:
frank is a 68-year-old widowed white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and his highest level of education is a high school diploma. frank is a devout roman catholic, although he seldom attends religious services.

politically, frank identifies as a conservative republican, and he is registered to vote at his current address. despite his age, he is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day. frank comes from a middle-income household, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 per year.

while frank was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen, he does not have any hispanic or latino heritage. he is not involved in any volunteer work or community activities.

overall, frank is a retired, widowed man who lives a relatively simple life in a metropolitan area of the midwest. he holds traditional conservative values, is deeply rooted in his catholic faith, and keeps up with technology by frequently using the internet.
